concept.title: Tag Attribute
concept.shortdesc: A tag is an optional record attribute that you can define. Define a tag when you want to indicate the source for the record and use that information to differentiate between records. You can add a tag for each group of files defined in the stage.

conbody.p: File Tail origintag attributeIn the pipeline, you can use the following expression to return the tag attribute:record:attribute('tag')
